title: The Ideal Fallen Angel!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Kukuku~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What!? Wasn’t that pose just now super cute!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You don’t get what a fallen angel is at all, Kasumi! Fallen angels aren’t cute at all! They’re supposed to be mysterious and terrifying... Ugh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s a lie.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, it isn’t!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>But you’re cute, Yohane.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Don’t you think your fallen angel clothes and pose are cute? That’s why Kasumin asked you to teach her…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait, huh...? I’ll have to think a little more about this...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
